original_title: Saqf Dimashq wa hykayat al jannah
overview: Syrian traditional story-telling, folklore, tales, fictional mythological characters play an important role in their culture. This tradition is passed generation to the next generation â€” from grandparents to grandchildren. However, in the modern era these stories are being lost. This is happening in Damascus, the capital and the second largest city of Syria, too.
title: Damascus Roof and Tales of Paradise
